basics.name: Anton Galitsyn
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: I am passionate about creating software products, which can improve every-day life. I always tend to be a diligent person, concentrate upon an objectives and work out it properly. It’s important for me to have self-possession and to be laid-back and modest person for team-members.

work.summary: Outsourcing company. I was involved in building webistes as a fullstack developer using LAMP stack on backend and JS on frontend.
highlights: Cultural & educational media website
2 TV channel websites
Several corporate websites
Guide on restaurants website

work.summary: Parallels Presence Builder team, worked on interactive website builder. I came here after some experience in CMS's at previous job. Same here, LAMP stack on backend and JS on frontend. Project was created in 2004, legacy codebase with layered architecture. But, generally it was a web app where JS SPA app communicates with LAMP backend using REST API.
highlights: Released WPB 11.6
8 month on WPB 12, which was never released, because project was closed by management

work.summary: Parallels Automation team, shared Hosting Module. At this moment I decided that my primary direction is backend development. So, my primary tasks continued with PHP, but no more JS at work. Also, I was developing small tools using bash and python for linux.
highlights: This was a big project with SOA architecture. Old core in C++, new in Java. All of that was using CORBA for communication
I worked on dispatcher component - web app written in PHP (Symfony 2 and Doctrine) with multiple integration points: REST, CLI, RPC
Deployment and upgrade scripts for out component
Python and Bash programming for tools on Linux

work.summary: Continuous delivery team. Building private cloud and application delivery platform.
highlights: Python and Go programming
Integration of Openstack as private cloud solution
Openstack custom development, admisitration and support (Icehouse - Kilo)
Openstack provisioning tools
Docker, CoreOS, Deis integration
CI/CD pipelines automation
Also participated in messenger team as backend developer

work.summary: Application team. Developing management layer for distributed services on Kubernetes.
highlights: Remote work
Go programming, bash
Lots of kubernetes, docker and etcd
Working on application lifecycles, (create, upgrade, downgrade atomic operations)
Both application and infrastructure development
Participated in market-data app, as developer (go, kafka, postgres) and devops (CI/CD, deploy, monitoring, logging)
Participated in integration of company-wide kubernetes cluster as developer of logging system (go, clickhouse, fluent-bit)
Both application and infrastructure development
Participated as developer (go, postgres) and devops (CI/CD, deploy, monitoring, logging)

education.institution: Siberian State University of Telecommunications and Information Sciences

skills.name: Project management
keywords: Small team management, Scrum and Kanban practices

skills.name: Backend Web Development
keywords: Go: RESTful web services, CLI tools
Python: Django web apps, CLI tools
Building apps for Kubernetes using Helm
CI/CD pipelines automation: Jenkins, TeamCity, Gitlab CI

skills.name: Operations
keywords: Familiar with incident management: on-call rotation, post-mortems, customer support
